recommendationHistory.caption: June 27, 2019, Urs reported directly to Sarbari
recommendationHistory.description:
Sarbary was very much engaged in her job and this is truly motivating. She does not have mood swings that can make work so difficult. She believes in the future of the company and so making all our jobs meaningful. With her open character she builds up trust. She built up a team of us GMP auditors what is not easy. We feel that she is willing to take a courageous stand. With all that, we did not need to care about any internal politics. Sarbary showed a sincere interest in us auditors and the solutions to our problems. As she did herself some audits together with us, she understood very well the issues in auditing and was aware of our strong and weak sides. With her auditing she provides a positive example; "walks the talk" – not only asking but also delivering to our targets. As she doesn’t micromanage we are also much more productive.
She organized some good short trainings during our monthly calls. This is essential to keep up with projects in the company and compensates somewhat for the limited training budget. During the meetings, she encouraged open dialog what was again good for team building. Nevertheless, she makes effective use of discretionary time and the meeting stayed short.
She effectively puts plans into action. We get in a short time a decision on plan changes and with this planning, is less cumbersome and better accepted by the sites.
It was great to have her as my last boss before retiring from Novartis. Thank you.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 22, 2019, Jeffrey reported directly to Sarbari
recommendationHistory.description: For several years I had the pleasure of working in Sarbari’s GMP auditing team, where I was coached and challenged; consulted and respected; empowered and valued. During that time I came to know Sarbari as a knowledgeable and experienced quality professional, unafraid of challenging the status quo. She was as much at ease learning from members of her team as she was representing our work to upper management. Sarbari earned my loyalty and is a leader I would happily follow again.

recommendationHistory.caption: July 24, 2018, Steven was senior to Sarbari but didn't manage Sarbari directly
recommendationHistory.description: I highly recommend Sarbari Roy to any company that is looking for a dedicated, hard-working, smart and talented manager and leader. Sabari and I worked together at Novartis for a few years and I was impressed with her organizational skills and “can-do” attitude. She aptly managed the Novartis GMP Corporate audit plan each year we were together and exceeded the vast majority of her goals. I was equally impressed with her managerial and leadership abilities. She led a staff of highly seasoned, veteran auditors who conducted audits across the globe. Through her leadership, she and the audit team were able to uncover opportunities for improvement that helped ensure the product being produced was safe and effective; the patient received a fit-for-use product and the company was fully compliant with all of the global laws and regs (in each of the several hundred countries where NVS marketed products). In summary, any company would benefit from Sarbari’s knowledge and skills.

recommendationHistory.caption: July 8, 2018, Rob managed Sarbari directly
recommendationHistory.description:
I was Sarbari’s manager for 5 years when she worked in Quality Assurance, Pharmaceutical Development, AstraZeneca.

Sarbari is a QA professional with extensive experience in both development and commercial manufacture.  Sarbari has a very positive “can-do” attitude and builds effective working relationships with her colleagues and other organizations she works with. 

During a major organizational change, Sarbari took on the leadership of a new group and worked tenaciously to define and deliver a clear set of goals. Later she made a major decision to switch to Novartis Switzerland. The skills highlighted earlier allowed her to make the adjustment to a new environment.

Sarbari brings and applies a unique combination of technical and personal skills. In particular, Sarbari delegates tasks to her subordinates in an effective way, giving them clear responsibility for delivery while providing coaching and mentoring support.

recommendationHistory.caption: June 19, 2018, Richard worked with Sarbari on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: I have work alongside Sarbari for the past five years as leaders for two successive organizations. In that time, I have come to know Sarbari as skilled, collaborative, and decisive leader, as well as a technical expert in GMP QA.  Sarbari is role model to her team and peers in demonstrating innovation, quality, collaboration, performance, courage, and integrity. In particular, Sarbari is courageous in speaking up for what is right and not settling for the status-quo. She is generous in supplying new ideas and perspectives, and is a attentive listener to alternate viewpoints. Sarbari has been a good counsellor to me in my personal development, and a confident and friend. It is a pleasure to work with Sarbari. She is an asset to her colleagues and the organization.

company.name: Philip Morris International
company.description:
Philip Morris International (PMI) is a leading international tobacco company working to deliver a smoke-free future and evolving its portfolio for the long term to include products outside of the tobacco and nicotine sector. Since 2008, PMI has invested more than USD 10.5 billion to develop, scientifically substantiate and commercialize innovative smoke-free products for adults who would otherwise continue to smoke, with the goal of completely ending the sale of cigarettes. In November 2022, PMI acquired Swedish Match – a leader in oral nicotine delivery – creating a global smoke-free champion led by the companies’ IQOS and ZYN brands. As of September 30, 2023, PMI's smoke-free products were available for sale in 82 markets, and PMI estimates that approximately 19.7 million adults around the world had already switched to IQOS and stopped smoking. Smoke-free products account for approximately 36.2% of PMI’s total third-quarter 2023 net revenues. With a strong foundation and significant expertise in life sciences, PMI announced in February 2021 its ambition to expand into wellness and healthcare areas and, through its Vectura Fertin Pharma business, aims to enhance life through the delivery of seamless health experiences. For more information, please visit www.pmi.com and www.pmiscience.com.

Our priority is to attract, support and keep with us diverse and unique individuals. Our global workforce of more than 69,000 people is one of our greatest strengths and the key to our success as a company. Our employees speak more than 80 languages and come from all corners of the world. PMI has also been certified as a “Global Top Employer” for the seventh consecutive year, in recognition of the high standards of excellence in our working environment and the exceptional development opportunities we offer. If you come into our offices or meet our people, you will quickly realize that at PMI everyone has the opportunity to make a difference and build phenomenal careers.

company.name: RONAL GROUP
company.description:
«Great Passion for Great Wheels»

With its headquarters in Härkingen (Switzerland), the RONAL GROUP is one of the world's leading manufacturers of alloy wheels for cars and commercial vehicles. The company is active on both the OEM and aftermarket for cars and commercial vehicles. 
 
Each year, the RONAL GROUP is capable of producing more than 19 million wheels in its 13 plants located across three continents. We carry out all production steps ourselves, from the design to tool making and the final product. Thanks to 50 years of know-how in wheel manufacturing, our customers include all renowned automotive manufacturers worldwide. 

In addition, under our own brand RONAL, we market an extensive range of aluminum wheels for the aftermarket. With the SPEEDLINE TRUCK brand, the Group also has a range of products for commercial vehicles, trailers and touring coaches, in both original equipment and aftermarket production. 

Around 6,500 employees currently work for the RONAL GROUP at several subsidiaries around the globe, in administration and production. Furthermore, the RONAL GROUP manufactures its own tools at two sites and has in RONLOG a central logistic center for its products. In our new RONAL TECHNOLOGIE GmbH innovation center, new technologies, materials and products of tomorrow are researched; solutions are developed with which the RONAL GROUP will be able to contribute towards shaping the mobility of the future.

In addition to keeping an eye on economic growth, the RONAL GROUP has for years been focusing on its responsibility for future generations with its PLANBLUE concept. We have set ourselves ambitious targets in the fields of "Our Business," "Our World" and "Our People." These concern the topics of "Sustainable and innovative products," "Energy and climate," and "Employee development, occupational safety and health." 

RONAL GROUP also manufactures shower trays and enclosures under the RONAL Bathrooms brand.

recommendationHistory.caption: January 6, 2014, Michel reported directly to Carl
recommendationHistory.description: I worked within the quality Management team of Mr. Kendall at Mann + Hummel Automotive GmbH for a global automotive project. Mr. Kendall led his team with a clearly defined and communicated strategy. His desire to have an efficient team helped his team to enjoy his perfect knowledge of the automotive industry and especially his long managerial experience. It was an honor to work with Mr. Kendall, who showed me what, has become my managerial pillars: respect for ethical values, vision / strategy, communication and availability.

recommendationHistory.caption: December 1, 2013, Dr. James worked with Carl on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: I have worked with Carl on the Operations Central Quality team and was really impressed with him in a number of ways: he is extremely hard working and proactive, with a high degree of self motivation and determination to get the job done. In turn, these attributes rub off on other team members who respond accordingly. Carl is extremely knowledgeable on the Quality subject matter and is able to articulate the knowledge to the uninitiated in a "user friendly" way - he is able to bring on and include people in the subject or topic and not leave them behind. Equally he is a great listener and will seek advice from others where necessary.   Carl has a great dexterity of mind and can assimilate information easily, even if it is outside of his normal comfort zone. Finally, he is a great person to work with as he is pleasant, courteous and always willing to help others - I continue to learn a lot from Carl and heartily give him the utmost respect.

recommendationHistory.caption: March 6, 2012, Chris reported directly to Carl
recommendationHistory.description: I've worked for Mr. Kendall in two different companies in two different countries over the past five years. He has always led from the front, simultaneously demonstrating clear strategic direction and detail-oriented management. His knowledge of the automotive industry is only surpassed by his unbelievable work ethic. A true leader who knows how to operate locally, regionally and globally he continues to be a role model for me in all aspects of management.

company.tagline: Intelligent use of vacuum is essential in tackling the challenges of our future.
company.description:
The Busch Group is one of the world’s largest manufacturers of vacuum pumps, vacuum systems, blowers, compressors and gas abatement systems. Under its umbrella, the group houses three well-known brands: Busch Vacuum Solutions, Pfeiffer Vacuum and centrotherm clean solutions.

The extensive product portfolio makes the Busch Group your preferred solution provider for vacuum, overpressure and abatement applications in all industries, such as semiconductors, food, analytics, chemicals and plastics. This also includes the design and construction of tailor-made vacuum systems and the industry’s most extensive worldwide service network.

The Busch Group is a family business that is managed by the Busch family. More than 8,000 employees in 44 countries worldwide work for the group. Since its beginnings more than 60 years ago, Busch is headquartered in Maulburg, Germany, in the tri-country region of Germany, France and Switzerland.

Today, the Busch Group manufactures in its 19 own production plants in China, the Czech Republic, France, Germany, India, Romania, South Korea, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, the USA and Vietnam, always near to its customers for fast delivery around the globe.

What characterizes the family-owned Busch Group is stability, reliability and flexibility. This combination makes us your best one-stop supplier in the vacuum market for innovative, individual solutions.

person.headline: Head of Global Quality Management | Head of Quality | Quality Manager | Leiter Qualitätsmanagement | Qualitätsleiter | Leiter QHES | Lead Auditor ASME NQA-1
person.summary:
Ich bin Cemal Yilmaz, Head of Global Quality Management. Seit drei Jahren bin ich verantwortlich für das globale Qualitätsmanagement, Arbeitssicherheit und Umweltmanagement. Ich habe einen Diplom-Abschluss als Elektroingenieur FH, NDS in Qualitätsmanagement, und eine Ausbildung als Lean Experte. 

Mein Ziel ist es, die Kundenzufriedenheit und die Stimme des Kunden zu verbessern, indem ich die Produktqualität, die Prozessqualität und die Qualitätskultur kontinuierlich optimiere. Ich habe Erfahrung und bin Lead Auditor in der Nuklearen Qualitätssicherung nach ASME NQA-1, 10CFR50 App.B, 10CFR21 und bin sehr versiert mit den Anforderungen der ISO9001, ISO14001 und ISO45001. 

Ich wende Lean Six Sigma Methoden und Werkzeuge an, um die Ursachen von Fehlern zu analysieren und Qualitätsverbesserungsprojekte zu leiten. Ich arbeite eng mit internen und externen Partnern zusammen, um die Qualitätsstandards und die Kundenerwartungen zu erfüllen. 

Ich bin den operativen Tätigkeiten wie auch mit strategischem Qualitätsmanagement sehr vertraut.

recommendationHistory.caption: January 29, 2024, Andreas worked with Cemal on the same team
recommendationHistory.description:
Aus folgenden Gründen kann ich Herr Cemal Yilmaz bestens empfehlen:
- Er ist ein sehr positiv eingestellter und gewinnender Mensch, seine Mitarbeitenden haben bei ihm einen sehr hohen Stellenwert und durch seine wertvollen Inputs auch weiter wachsen können.
- An seinem Wesen haben mich folgende Werte beeindruckt: er ist absolut Loyal, ehrlich, verbindlich und besitzt eine sehr präzise Arbeitsweise
- Seine Beziehungen zu Arbeitskollegen sind langfristig und gewinnend ausgerichtet, er vertritt starke Werte
- Seine Prozesse digitalisiert er sehr gern (absolut "digital nativ"), in diesem Thema hat er ausserordentliche Fähigkeiten
- In der Zusammenarbeit sehr wertschätzend, kritisch, offen und fokussiert
- Im Bereich Qualität- Kompetenzen zeigen seine bisherigen Erfahrungen sein hohes Niveau auf
- Mit ihm habe ich sehr gerne zusammengearbeitet und hoffe, dass ich wieder einmal die Chance dazu habe, es war mir eine Ehre

company.name: Johnson Electric

At Johnson Electric, our vision is to be the world’s definitive provider of innovative and reliable motion systems.

company.name: Stabilus
company.description:
Welcome to the Stabilus Group – your experts for innovative motion control in a multitude of applications and sectors. 
We love technology and live for change. Today, we can proudly present ourselves as a well-developed and future-oriented company, as an example of driven transformation from component provider to systems provider, and as a global player that stays true to its position and values in matters big and small. 
Our people make us successful. Our policy conveys a clear pledge to customers and investors: We are on the way to reaching the target of our vision – world market leader in intelligent motion control technology by 2030.

Stabilus is one of the world's leading providers of motion control solutions across a broad spectrum of industries including mobility, industrial machinery, automation, energy, construction, health, recreation and furniture. Stabilus offers reliable and innovative solutions that enable, enhance and automate precise movement, positioning, opening, closing, lifting, lowering and adjusting actions. With its operational headquarters in Koblenz, Germany, the Stabilus Group has a global production and sales network with more than eight thousand employees and reported revenue of €1.2 billion in the 2023 fiscal year. Stabilus SE is listed in the Prime Standard segment of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange and is included in the MDAX index. Further information is available at www.stabilus.com .

company.name: Eutron
company.description:
Eutron, founded in 1986, is a key player in the design, engineering, and production of mechatronic solutions. 
A pioneer in electronics for the textile market and strengthened by the Belgian group Vandewiele, Eutron has expanded its horizons by delivering innovative solutions in new sectors, including Vending, Elevator, Industrial Automation, and Energy Distribution.
Guided by the principles of Lean Production, Eutron shapes customer ideas through cutting-edge digital technologies, ranging from Design-To-Performance to Servitization, encompassing Prototyping, Test Development, and optimization of the Integrated Supply Chain.
Eutron manages the entire product life cycle and, leveraging its established expertise and internal R&D team, completes its offer by tailor-made System On Module (SoM) solutions.
Eutron - Inspired by expertise.

company.name: vVARDIS
company.description:
Founded in Switzerland by Dr. Haley Abivardi, DMD & Dr. Goly Abivardi, DMD, vVARDIS is the result of a combined 30 years of dental and entrepreneurial experience, 20 years of research paired with the creative vision of its founders. 
At the heart of vVARDIS is the breakthrough patented biomimetic peptide technology in Curodont Repair. Proven in more than 200 publications, it can arrest and reverse early caries via in-depth remineralization and regeneration of enamel, offering a non-invasive, pain-free solution for patients of all ages. 
Incredibly versatile, the vVARDIS peptide technology is present in all our professional and daily oral care products offering protection from tooth decay, erosion, and sensitivity. The future of oral health is here.

person.headline: QA Manager | Quality Management
person.summary:
After obtaining a PhD in Aerodynamics and serving as Project Manager at BMT Fluid Mechanics Ltd, responsible for aerodynamics and TBMA (Tall Building Modular Analysis), I changed direction in 2011. I then specialised in Quality and Compliance Management with a number of international companies across the Medical Device spectrum. In these positions I was able to combine my Engineering and Project Management expertise to establish and embed best international practice within laboratories, product development projects, design control, EHS and continuous improvement initiatives.
During the course of my career, I gained in-depth knowledge of International Standards and their application -ISO 13485, ISO 9001, ISO 14971, ISO 14001, ISO 17025, OHSAS18001. In addition, I have employed various tools and methodologies to harness the talents and potential of cross-disciplinary, multicultural teams as a PRRC, Six Sigma certified Green Belt and PRINCE2 Practitioner.
While focusing on technical, business and timeline challenges, I also prioritise People management. Whether it be my team, that I recruited and trained, or other stakeholders such as suppliers, business unit heads, executive boards and shareholders, I am able to communicate persuasively and clearly (bilingual in German and English), presenting and reporting on progress, risks and opportunities. In doing so I have influenced strategy and operations positively, bringing innovation, pragmatism, and collaboration to global organisations. I hope to continue on this trajectory with forward-thinking partners.

Quality is never an accident; it is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, intelligent direction and skilful execution; it represents the wise choice of many alternatives. 

William A. Foster

company.name: Roche
company.description:
Roche is a global pioneer in pharmaceuticals and diagnostics focused on advancing science to improve people’s lives. The combined strengths of pharmaceuticals and diagnostics under one roof have made Roche the leader in personalised healthcare – a strategy that aims to fit the right treatment to each patient in the best way possible.

Roche is the world’s largest biotech company, with truly differentiated medicines in oncology, immunology, infectious diseases, ophthalmology and diseases of the central nervous system. Roche is also the world leader in in vitro diagnostics and tissue-based cancer diagnostics, and a frontrunner in diabetes management.

Founded in 1896, Roche continues to search for better ways to prevent, diagnose and treat diseases and make a sustainable contribution to society. The company also aims to improve patient access to medical innovations by working with all relevant stakeholders. Thirty medicines developed by Roche are included in the World Health Organization Model Lists of Essential Medicines, among them life-saving antibiotics, antimalarials and cancer medicines. Roche has been recognised as the Group Leader in sustainability within the Pharmaceuticals, Biotechnology & Life Sciences Industry ten years in a row by the Dow Jones Sustainability Indices (DJSI).

For more information, please visit https://careers.roche.com

Read our community guidelines here: 
https://www.roche.com/some-guidelines.htm

#Roche #Biotechnology #Pharmaceuticals #Diagnostics #Healthcare #PersonalisedHealthcare #GreatPlaceToWork #Innovation

recommendationHistory.caption: April 30, 2019, Alison worked with Sam on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: I worked with Sam Bollen at Dura Automotive as we reported into the same Quality Organization.  I found Sam to be extremely passionate and dedicated to excellence and customer satisfaction.  Sam is not only knowledgeable in his field but also portrays a superb quality mind-set always thinking one step ahead and looking at quality through the eyes of the customer.  Sam has significantly reduced the cost of poor quality by applying best in practice methodologies and forging partnerships at the Plants in his region.  With Sam’s ability to converse in several languages coupled with his ability to problem solve at plant level and in the boardroom, I would recommend Sam to any organization that is looking for a true Quality Professional.

recommendationHistory.caption: April 15, 2019, Arvis S managed Sam directly
recommendationHistory.description:
Sam Bollen has demonstrated remarkable results over his tenure with Dura Automotive LLC.
Sam was assigned the most difficult, challenging, segment in the Europe operation. At the end of Sam’s first year, he successfully drove a positive mean shift in the quality performance, reducing ‘poor’ cost of quality by nearly thirty percent following my focus strategies for him. In the second year he reduced overall cost by an additional thirty percent. Sam accomplished this by working tenaciously with the plant teams, effective problem solving, and focusing the quality and plant managers on the KPIs.

He has proven his ability to problem solve, follow up and resolve systemic and pervasive issues.
As an Electrical Engineer with an accomplished career, he has a very good technical aptitude
and is process oriented. He learns new products and processes quickly, and navigates
environments just as effectively.

Sam is dependable and I have come to regard him as my ’right hand’. Sam has impeccable
integrity and his word is his bond. Every leader should be fortunate enough to have Sam on
their team. I trust his judgment and I value him as a person with high ethics!

recommendationHistory.caption: August 6, 2012, Maarten worked with Sam but on different teams
recommendationHistory.description: Mr. Bollen's contributions have opened some eyes on SQA practices here and his methodology might certainly contribute to the strong re-positioning of Infrabel's multi-million euro contracts. If this would fail somehow, then Sam's (very) open attitude and shared knowledge is certainly not to blame.

company.name: Agratas
company.description:
Agratas is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tata Sons. We design, develop and manufacture high-quality, high-performance, sustainable batteries applied to multiple use cases in the mobility and energy sectors, to match our customers’ requirements.

We will accelerate the global transition to net zero by creating an industry-leading benchmark in sustainability. Our world-class gigafactories will be powered by purpose-built renewable energy plants. We will also embed circular economy processes throughout our value chain to reuse, recycle and recover materials back into production.

We will serve customers in Passenger Vehicle, Commercial Vehicle, 2 and 3 Wheeler and Energy Storage Solution (ESS) industries, supplying state-of-the-art high energy density NMC and long lasting LFP battery cells. Agratas will also support its customers with the integration of cells into their applications, such as modules and packs. We have already secured two anchor customers, Tata Motors and JLR. They provide us with the scale to establish our global battery business.

Agratas will be driven by our pursuit of green growth and technological progress. We will develop next-generation battery technologies at new R&D Innovation Hubs in India and the UK, collaborating with world-leading universities, research institutions and strategic partners.

We are a scale-up business with a start-up mentality. Our name, derived from the Sanskrit word ‘Agra’, the world’s oldest language, stands for leadership. It reflects our ambition to be purpose driven, pioneering power for future generations.

company.name: MANN+HUMMEL
company.description:
MANN+HUMMEL is a leading global company in filtration technology. Under its two business units Transportation and Life Sciences & Environment, the Ludwigsburg-based Group (Germany) develops intelligent filtration and separation solutions that enable cleaner mobility, cleaner air, cleaner water, and cleaner industry. Thus, the company makes an important contribution to a clean earth and the sustainable use of limited resources. In 2023, over 22,000 employees at more than 80 locations generated a turnover of EUR 4.7 billion. 

The portfolio comprises fuel, oil and air filters for combustion engines and industrial applications, filtration solutions for electric and hydrogen powered vehicles, simulation technologies and filter media, as well as membrane technologies for municipal and industrial water and wastewater treatment and use in sensitive process applications such as food production or biotechnology. Furthermore, the family-owned company, founded in 1941, offers air and molecular filtration technologies for vehicle interiors, building filtration, as well as industrial applications and cleanrooms.

You can find further information on MANN+HUMMEL at https://www.mann-hummel.com/

company.name: Autoliv
company.tagline: Our Vision is Saving More Lives
company.description:
Autoliv, Inc. is the worldwide leader in automotive safety systems. We develop, manufacture and market protective systems, such as airbags, seatbelts, steering wheels and pedestrian protection systems for all major automotive manufacturers in the world. Our products save 35,000 lives and prevent 450,000 injuries each year. 

Our ~70,000 employees in 25 countries are passionate about our vision of Saving More Lives and quality is at the heart of everything we do. We have 14 technical centers, with 20 test tracks.  

In the world of automotive occupant safety, we were the first to introduce the two- and three-point seat belt system and airbags for front and side impacts. We were also the first to launch pyrotechnic belt pretensioners and pedestrian protection systems. 
 
Autoliv, Inc. is a publicly traded Delaware U.S.  corporation with its headquarters in Stockholm, Sweden. The shares are listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE: ALV) and the Swedish Depository Receipts on Nasdaq Stockholm (ALIV sdb). For more information go to www.autoliv.com.

company.name: Metalor Technologies SA
company.description:
Metalor is a Swiss-based global independent company (part of the Tanaka Group) working in the precious metal fields that was created in 1852 with subsidiaries in 17 countries (in Europe, Americas and Asia) and more than 1500 employees; the company has 3 business groups, each corresponding to a group of specific markets: Refining, Advanced Coatings & Electrotechnics.

Our mission is to provide high quality products and services that exceed the expectations of our customers while applying irreproachable ethic principles and promoting sustainable practices all along our activity.

In this respect, one of our basic goals is to ensure a robust and traceable supply chain for all precious metals sourcing. We implement due-diligence processes and comply with the highest international standards, both legal and ethical. We are a founding member of the Swiss Better Gold Association and are actively involved in promoting the formalization process of artisanal gold producers.

Metalor products and services do serve a wide range of industries that use them in a multitude of applications that decidedly contribute to have a more advance and sustainable world. We put innovation at the heart of our corporate culture; we develop solutions to meet their needs in their various domains of activity. Our objective is to establish transparent and long-term relationships with all our customers and suppliers.

Our employees are our strength. The competence of our workforce worldwide is what contributes to keep and further enhance the high standard of all Metalor’s products and services. We endeavour to create a safe working environment for all our employees and offer the opportunity to progress where possible. We strive to advocate and offer equal opportunity for all.
Metalor takes its responsibility towards the environment and sustainability very seriously. We work to lessen the environmental impact of our business practises.

For more information about Metalor, please visit our new website.

person.headline: With over 30 years of experience in • Quality Assurance • Quality Management • Operational Excellence • Audits • Environmental & Sustainability Management • in Manufacturing Operations
person.summary:
I am passionate about ensuring high quality. My resilience allows me to handle stress well, and my decisions are based on analytical thinking, making me both process- and solution-oriented. I am IT-savvy and a fan of integrated management systems (IMS).

My expertise spans industries such as mold making, injection molding, mechanical engineering, automation, paper manufacturing, HVAC, and water treatment (ARA). I have successfully conducted new and re-certifications according to ISO 9001, 9100, 45001, 14001, and 50001, as well as HALAL, CWA, and CO2 accounting.

In the production industry, I have significantly contributed to improving quality and reducing quality costs through the application of quality tools such as A3, 8D, Ishikawa, 5W, Six Sigma, Turtle, FMEA, and LEAN instruments like value stream mapping, 5S, TPM, T-Cart, and SFM.

I possess recognized leadership qualities, acquired through practical experience and further education at renowned universities. I find working in an international environment very satisfying and eagerly take on challenges.

company.name: Bristol Myers Squibb
company.description:
At Bristol Myers Squibb, we work every day to transform patients’ lives through science. That work inspires some of the most interesting, meaningful, and life-changing careers you’ll experience. Join us and pursue innovative ideas alongside some of the brightest minds in biopharma, collaborating with a team rich in diversity of experiences, and perspectives. We have built a sustainable pipeline of potential therapies and are leveraging translational medicine and data analytics to understand how we can deliver the right medicine to the right patient, at the right time, to achieve the best outcome.

Whether in a scientific, business or supporting function, a career at BMS means you’ll be inspired every day to grow and thrive through opportunities that are uncommon in scale and scope. Here, you’ll be on the cutting edge of powerful innovation in oncology, hematology, immunology, cardiovascular disease, and fibrosis, with colleagues united in the mission to help patients.

Through the Bristol Myers Squibb Foundation, we also promote health equity and seek to improve health outcomes of populations disproportionately affected by serious diseases and conditions. Our mission is to give new hope to help patients prevail over serious disease – it drives everything we do.

Review our Social Media Community Guidelines at: https://www.bms.com/social-media-community-guidelines.html

company.name: Trafag HQ - The high-tech sensor company
company.tagline: Precise measurement and reliable monitoring of pressure, temperature, insulation gas density
company.description:
Die seit 1942 gegründete Trafag AG entwickelt, produziert und vertreibt international qualitativ hochstehende Sensoren und Überwachungsgeräte für Druck, Temperatur und Gasdichte. 

Qualifizierte Mitarbeitende verschiedenster Berufsrichtungen arbeiten täglich daran, Trafags Position als international tätiger Hersteller und Anbieter von präzisen Mess- und Überwachungsgeräten zu festigen und auszubauen. Arbeiten bei der Trafag bedeutet, im dynamischen Umfeld einer kontinuierlich wachsenden High-Tech-Firma Teil eines internationalen und multikulturellen Teams zu sein. Gegenseitiger Respekt und Wertschätzung sind gelebte Werte in unserer Zusammenarbeit und die zentrale Basis, um hervorragende Lösungen für unsere Kunden zu realisieren. 

Neben einer Vielzahl von standardisierten, konfigurierbaren Produkten wie Drucktransmittern, Druckmessumformern, Druckschaltern, Thermostaten, Temperaturtransmittern, SF6 Gasdichtewächtern und SF6 Gasdichtesensoren, produziert Trafag auch massgeschneiderte und eigens entwickelte Lösungen für ihre Kundschaft – je nach geforderter Spezifikation. 

In den Anwendungsbereichen Hochspannungsschaltanlagen (SF6 Gasdichtesensoren & -wächter), Schiffsbau und Grossmotorenbau (Drucktransmittern, Thermostaten und mechanische Druckschalter) ist die Trafag weltweit führend. Das High-Tech-Unternehmen schafft es erstklassige und zuverlässige Produkte zu liefern, welche höchsten Qualitätsanforderungen entsprechen und den dauerhaften Druckbelastungen sowie Witterungsbedingungen Stand halten können. Auch im Schienenverkehr, bei mobilen und stationären Hydraulikanwendungen und bei Materialprüfständen liefert die Unternehmung einzigartige Produkte. Um die hohen Qualitätsansprüche einzuhalten, kommen bei der Trafag modernste Produktionsanlagen unter Reinraumbedingungen zum Einsatz. Die Produktionsprozesse werden streng überwacht und nachhaltig optimiert. Zudem ist das Unternehmen ISO 9001 und ISO 14001 zertifiziert.

Mehr Infos unter: https://www.trafag.com

person.headline: VP | Head of Quality @ Franke Group | MBA
person.summary:
As the VP | Head of Quality and a member of the Global Leadership Team at Franke Group, I am responsible for driving the quality strategy, standards, and culture across the organization. I have over 10 years of experience in leading quality, process, and in various industries, including automotive, medical, and industrial solutions.

My core competencies include implementing and maintaining integrated management systems (IMS) based on ISO 9001, 13485, 14001, and PART 820, developing and executing new business concepts and solutions, and managing international teams and projects across different cultures and regions. I am also a certified executive master of business administration (EMBA) and a high performance leadership (HPL) graduate from prestigious institutions. I am passionate about continuous improvement, innovation, and excellence, and I aim to deliver value and satisfaction to Franke's customers and stakeholders.

person.headline: Leiter QEHS | Erfahrener Qualitätsmanager | Durchsetzungsfähiger Projektleiter | Motivierender Mitarbeiter Coach | Mitarbeiterentwicklung und Förderung als Leidenschaft | Teamplayer
person.summary:
Ich freue mich, Du hast es auf meine Info Seite geschafft um mehr über mich zu erfahren.
Ich verehre die "Du" Kultur, sie ist ein perfekter "Ice breaker" im Berufsalltag. 

Ich bin ein leidenschaftlicher erfahrener Qualitätsmanager mit mehr als 15 Jahren Berufserfahrung in der Automobil- und Stahlindustrie und seit einigen Jahren Head of Quality bei BENTELER Group in Rothrist, einem globalen Anbieter von innovativen Lösungen für die Mobilität.

Ich darf ein Team von 23 qualifizierten Fachkräften leiten, die für die Sicherstellung und Verbesserung der Produktqualität, die Durchführung von Audits und die Anwendung von zerstörungsfreien Prüfmethoden verantwortlich sind. Ich bin zertifizierter Qualitätsmanager, Qualitätsmanagement Auditor, und verfüge über fundierte Kenntnisse in den Bereichen Qualitätskontrolle, KVP, und NDT was unterstrichen wird mit den Ultraschall UT und Wirbelstrom ET Level 3 Zertifikaten.

Ich persönlich sehe mich als motivierenden Mitarbeiter-Coach und Mentor der leidenschaftlich die Mitarbeiterförderung und Entwicklung lebt.
Als vollblütiger Projektleiter mit nachweisbaren wirtschaftlich erfolgreichen Grossprojekten im Automotiv Sektor bin ich Durchsetzungsfähig, stehts Vorrausschauend, belastbar und überzeugend auf meine eigene Art und Weise.

Durch die viele Erfahrung in der Kommunikation mit Kunden zählt dies zu meinen Highlights im Berufsalltag. 

Ich bin ein engagierter, zuverlässiger und teamorientierter Mensch, der gerne neue Herausforderungen annimmt und sich stetig weiterbildet. Ich spreche fließend Englisch, Deutsch, habe Schulkentnisse in Russisch und lerne familiär stetig Chinesisch.

Wenn dieser kurze Text spannend für Dich ist, und Du gerne mehr erfahren möchtest, so kontaktiere mich doch einfach über die LinkedIn Nachrichten Funktion.

Ich freue mich Dich kennenzulernen.

person.headline: Personal and family project leave. Back in July!
person.summary:
Quality? A trans-functional discipline calling a wide knowledge and a combination of interpersonal skills and know-how to interact from marketing to after-sales passing through all others key company departments such as design, sales, production or logistics and aiming the conformity and optimization of the company’s processes.
HSE? (Health, Safety and Environment) More or less the same definition, isn’t it?
Engineer? Someone having a wide warehouse of knowledge and skills enables to pick them up and adapt their use to circumstances.
Manager? Someone having an overview on an organization and its processes, enabling him to manage priorities to drive his business and his partners for an overall better performance of the said organization.

As defined above, I am a Quality & HSE Engineer combined with a Manager…

Strong of an Engineer diploma in General Mechanics with coloration in Product Systemic Design, Quality was not a destiny. However, my predispositions drove me naturally in that way.
After a first experience in Engineering / R&D, my overview of the product but also social skills naturally helped me to gain my first Quality Assurance Manager Position (Parker Hannifin).
After 5 years as Quality Manager in a mass-production company (Quick-couplings for the agricultural, industrial and automotive market) I jumped for new challenges at Enraf Tanksystem (worldwide leader in portable level gauging and sampling equipment for the Marine Business): new organization, culture, market as well as a wider Position; continuous improvement, small organization, state-of-the-art devices, light and efficient based structure, Marine business and Quality & After-Sales Manager.
At mid 2007, Honeywell came onboard. How to integrate a light organization in such a Corporation? How to align effective and customized local processes without hurting the business but developing it? As part of the company management team, new critical and tricky challenges were offered… 
March 2020, I was welcomed by WIB (High Precision Ball Bearings manufacturer leader) and the covid crisis as QHSE Manager and member of the Steering Committee. For 3 years, cultural change and internal quality improvement were 2 main drivers resulting in -25% of COPQ in 2023.
After a year spent in an awesome family project travelling throughout Americas, I am ready for new challenges at Morand Constructions Metalliques. Another adventure is coming...

person.headline: BioTech | BioPharma | GxP | GCP | GMP | CDMO | Consultant | Vice President Global Quality | IMP QP RP | HSE
person.summary:
Experienced biopharmaceutical product developer and setting up quality systems with wide ranging experience.  Molecular Biologist and Biotechnologist by training, and Qualified Person, Richard gained his Master of Science degree in 1998 at the University of Groningen, The Netherlands. 
Richard has over the 25 years’ experience within GMP licensed facilities (FDA/EMA, Dutch authorities and Swissmedic), the last 18+ years at management level, within the biotechnology sector. During this time Richard has gained extensive, specialist experience in biologicals and biotech manufacture, including R&D, Quality Control/Assurance, GCP, Regulatory and Production management posts. 

He has broad experience in the manufacture and control of aseptically prepared biopharmaceuticals and biosimilars from clinical Phase-I up to commercial production. 

Richard has particular expertise in product development, technology transfer, and the application of GMP to the manufacture and control of clinical trial materials. 

Richard is eligible to act as a Qualified Person under the permanent provisions of LPTh, RS 812.21, Swiss Federal Therapeutic Product Act and therefore eligible to act as Qualified Person for Investigational Medicinal Product (IMP). 

Specialties: Setup of QMS, FMS, eDMS, GxP Audits, GMP Training and GMP facility setup support.

company.name: Ichnos Glenmark Innovation
company.description:
At Ichnos Glenmark Innovation (IGI), our mission is to provide curative therapies that extend and improve lives.

IGI is an alliance between Ichnos Sciences Inc., a global fully-integrated clinical-stage biotech company developing multispecifics™ in oncology, and its parent, Glenmark Pharmaceuticals Ltd. (Glenmark), with the aim to accelerate new drug discovery in cancer treatment. IGI combines Ichnos' research and development proficiencies in novel biologics with those of Glenmark’s in new small molecules to continue developing cutting-edge therapy solutions that treat hematological malignancies and solid tumors. Harnessing the combined proficiency of over 150 scientists and a robust pipeline of novel molecules, this collaboration will leverage the capabilities of its three global centers of innovation spread across the USA, Switzerland and India to propel Innovation.

We believe in the power of collaboration to drive innovation. Being an alliance, we ourselves embody this belief. Collaboration that helps us combine forces of expertise, technology, speed and reach between Ichnos and Glenmark as well as among other stakeholders. Collaboration that helps us transform the world of oncology by creating novel cutting-edge therapeutics, faster. Collaboration that kindles new hope for oncology patients, their families and healthcare professionals.

company.name: BENTELER Group
company.description:
BENTELER is a global company serving customers in automotive technology, the energy sector and mechanical engineering. As metal processing specialists, we develop, produce and distribute safety-related products, systems and services worldwide. In doing so, we are guided by our corporate values of courage, ambition and respect.
Our portfolio encompasses components and modules for the automotive industry, in the areas of chassis, body, engine and exhaust systems as well as future technologies such as battery storage systems for electric vehicles. 
Based on almost 150 years of experience in steel, we develop seamless and welded quality steel tubes – from material development to tube applications. In addition, we develop technical equipment and plant for leading automotive suppliers and for the glass-processing industry.

Under the management of the strategic holding BENTELER International AG, headquartered in Salzburg, Austria, our around 23,000 employees at 86 locations in 26 countries offer first-class manufacturing and sales competence – all dedicated to delivering a first-class service wherever our customers need us. In the 2023 financial year, Group revenues were around €8.8 billion.

BENTELER. The family of driven professionals. Since 1876.

www.benteler.com
